name: Ryan Stach
text: This place is supposed to be open till midnight. I placed my order online at 10 till. The "manager" called me 5 minutes later and told me they close 10 minutes till midnight. So I couldn't get my order. That's crap!!! I asked why they close …More

name: G M
text: I don't know if this place went through a change of management or what, but they are doing a good job now. Delivery was earlier than estimated, the quality was good, the folks working phones AND delivery were both very professional and polite. It's nice to know that the Kirkland area finally has a good pizza delivery place now.

name: michael milbourn
text: My wife and I have come here a few times to dine in and for carryout. They have always been friendly, attentive, and the food has always come pretty quickly and been hot. No complaints here.

name: Kara Drew
text: Fast delivery,  very reasonable prices, polite delivery boy....but the pizza. ...seriously worse then chuckie cheese....  wings were yummy though, ended up throwing a lot of food away. Need to cook their pizza thoroughly,  tasted raw and bland.

name: Skyler Gonsalves
text: Not good, not bad. Your standard Pizza Hut but with an awkward entrance and exit onto the main road. There are much better places nearby to eat, would recommend anything else but here.

name: Mike Rodriguez
text: This pizza hut is less than a mile from my apt. I ordered 2 pizzas and they said it would take an hour and a half to deliver. When i got the pizza it was cold and stale. This pizza hut sux. 2nd time this has happened! Just got off the phone …More

name: Brenda Osorio
text: This place has the worst service ever. Placed order online at 7:20 pm and said it would be ready for pick up by 7:40. I arrived by 8pm and it still wasnt ready until 8:25 and they gave me the wrong order and pizza was cold. Workers kept walking in and out the back and it smelled like weed.

name: Toddthe206geek
text: Waited almost 20min before leaving.  No one checked on us after seating us.  I've also ordered online with the play store app and it took them an hour to deliver to my place which is at most 5min away.  This pizza hut has the worst service of any fast food restaurant i have ever seen.

name: Emma Morris
text: I gave up on ordering from this Pizza Hut. I lived right up the street and it would take 1.5+ hours for my pizza to arrive. When it did, the order was usually wrong or missing something. I can't count the times the delivery guy had to come back to fix my order or bring something he forgot.

name: Chelsea Hellman
text: If I could give zero stars, I would! this place is atrocious with service. They never deliver when they say they are. My pizza is either cold or the wrong order! I just ordered from them for the last time! I just got my pizza and it was ice cold!

name: Lauren Hall-Stigerts
text: Ordered on the mobile app for pickup. Store sign says open until 11pm but it does not state that's only for delivery - I was told when I arrived the lobby closes at 10pm. I was turned away - not sure why they couldn't deliver my pizza outside to the parking lot.

name: anna w
text: ordered online at 10pm, stated close time is 11pm. when we arrived at 10:30 to pick up door was locked and the employee said they were closed. I wish I could choose when to close early.

name: Daniel Rodriguez
text: I got my pizza so they can do their job in a way but there were some communications errors, this could of been a lot better if they took the time to listen to their customers.

name: Jose Escobar
text: I like pizza hut but today a lady behaved very rude just because you caeron one hand and coins began to be gestures and almost made me roll sodas.

name: John doe
text: Slowest service out of all pizza hut locations
